value:
$nMPID_ロイ|Father, I'm not sure I can handle all
this attention...

$nMPID_エリウッド|It feels strange to say, but you are a
fine young man, Roy. I suspect I have
your mother to thank for that.

$nMPID_ロイ|Whoever catches the bouquet will
play the part of our brides, right? My
heart's pounding out of my chest...

$nMPID_エリウッド|I might be older than him now, but
perhaps one day we will meet again,
and he will be the older of us.

$nMPID_ロイ|So, we hold each other's hand, then...
Wait, which foot do I put forward?$k$pThe fact that you can keep track of
all this is incredible, Father.

$nMPID_エリウッド|I am Eliwood, here to give my regards
to both you and my future son, Roy.

$nMPID_ロイ|I can't believe I get to fight alongside
my father! I won't hold anything back!

$nMPID_ロイ|It's a bit difficult to move around in
this, but I'll wear it until I meet my
bride-to-be!

$nMPID_エリウッド|There's nothing to be discouraged
about. Everyone starts somewhere.

$nMPID_エリウッド|Thank you. I will do my utmost to live
up to your expectations.

I am Roy, son of Eliwood, marquess
of Pherae. I may only be playing the
role of groom, but I'll give it my all.$k$p...That said, I still can't believe I get
to spend time with my father like this.
Just look at him! He's so young!

$nMPID_エリウッド|It's about time, isn't it? I'm supposed
to be acting as a guardian, so you'll
be playing the role of a groom, Roy.$k$p$nMPID_ロイ|I'm not sure if I can do this... It seems
like I know all of the people who are
competing for the bouquet.$k$p$nMPID_エリウッド|Ah, yes, that does appear to be the
case. Hopefully that means your
special someone is among them.$k$p$nMPID_ロイ|W-wait! Hold on! Don't tell anyone!
You can't! Please, I'm begging you!$k$p$nMPID_エリウッド|Don't worry, I won't tell a soul. We
made a promise between future
father and future son, after all.$k$p...Oh! Do you hear that? It sounds like
the bells have started ringing.$k$p$nMPID_ロイ|That almost makes it sound like a real
wedding... Wait, why are you pushi—
Father, please! Just one more minute!
Yah!
Take that!
Whoa!?
At this rate...
It's no use...
$nMPID_二人|A pledge of love!
$nMPID_二人|We'll protect you! Always!
$nMPID_双界ロイ|For our loved ones.
$nMPID_エリウッド|For those we care about.
Oh no…it's ruined!
You can do this.
It's your time to shine!

• "Father!"
• "Right here."

• "Let's settle this."
• "I'm with you."
Heh...

• "Where's Mother?"
• "Oh, I don't know..."
Hm...
Shall we proceed?
Shall we?

$nMPID_双界ロイ|Hmm... How should this look? Does
this go…here?

$nMPID_エリウッド|The festival's about to begin, Roy.
Are you ready yet?

$nMPID_双界ロイ|Sorry, Father. Not quite. I've never
worn anything like this before. It's a
bit much for me.

What do you think? Does this look
right to you?

$nMPID_エリウッド|It looks great. You wear it so well, I
can scarcely believe you are my son.

But that says more about me than
you. Fatherhood still feels premature
to me—I'm not even married yet.

$nMPID_双界ロイ|But you're in love with Mother, aren't
you? Tell me, what do you like most
about her?

$nMPID_エリウッド|Hmm... I suppose it's her strength
I most admire, and her kindness
I most adore.

$nMPID_双界ロイ|It seems I do take after you. I feel the
same way about someone in my life.

$nMPID_エリウッド|Is that so? I would love to meet this
person who means so much to you.

$nMPID_双界ロイ|I'm not sure if that will happen at the
festival, but...I guess we'll see.

$nMPID_エリウッド|The possibility seems to make you
nervous. Is it because you happen to
be dressed as a bridegroom?

$nMPID_双界ロイ|Maybe, though marriage is a long way
off for me yet.

$nMPID_エリウッド|You're a fine young man, Roy...so fine
I sometimes forget how young.

Just think of today as a bit of
practice. Enjoy yourself!
$nMPID_双界ロイ|All right, now I really am nervous.

$nMPID_エリウッド|Relax. I'm right here with you.
Come on, let's get going.
